description: Enable AI assistants to interact seamlessly with Feeef e-commerce stores, products, and orders using powerful filtering and management tools. Authenticate securely to access user-specific data and perform advanced queries on stores, products, and orders. Simplify e-commerce operations by integrating comprehensive Feeef API capabilities into your AI workflows.

capabilities.name: users_auth_me
capabilities.description: Retrieve complete profile information for the currently authenticated user. Returns user identity, contact details, verification status, and custom metadata. Essential for session validation and profile display.

capabilities.name: users_auth_update
capabilities.description: Update authenticated user profile with comprehensive validation. Supports name, email, phone, avatar, and custom metadata changes. Includes uniqueness checking and format validation for business compliance.

capabilities.name: stores_list
capabilities.description: List stores with comprehensive filtering options for merchant management. Requires user authentication. Mirrors backend store listing schema.

capabilities.name: stores_create
capabilities.description: Create a new store with comprehensive configuration options matching backend CreateStoreSchema. Requires name, slug, and userId.

capabilities.name: stores_update
capabilities.description: Update a store by ID. Supports core fields and the full 'integrations' object (UpdateStoreSchema subset).

capabilities.name: stores_i10s_meta_pixel_set
capabilities.description: Set or modify the Meta Pixel integration on a store. Replace / merge / remove metaPixel subtree (objective, draft_objective, active, pixels).

capabilities.name: stores_i10s_tiktok_pixel_set
capabilities.description: Set or modify the TikTok Pixel integration on a store. Replace / merge / remove tiktokPixel subtree (objective, draft_objective, active, pixels).

capabilities.name: products_list
capabilities.description: Retrieve products from a store with advanced filtering. Supports full-text search across names/descriptions/SKUs, exact field matching, price ranges, and pagination. Essential for inventory management and customer product discovery.

capabilities.name: products_create
capabilities.description: Create a new product with comprehensive e-commerce features. Supports variants, pricing tiers, rich content, inventory tracking, and advanced catalog management. Essential for building complete product listings.

capabilities.name: products_update
capabilities.description: Update an existing product by ID (UpdateProductSchema).

capabilities.name: orders_list
capabilities.description: List orders with rich filters. Requires store_id. Supports status/payment_status/delivery_status/custom_status arrays, date ranges, tags, products, confirmer, sort.

capabilities.name: orders_show
capabilities.description: Show a single order by ID.

capabilities.name: orders_create
capabilities.description: Create a new order as store owner (CreateOrderSchema). Provide items[]. All inputs snake_case; nested item keys mapped.

capabilities.name: orders_update
capabilities.description: Update an order by ID (UpdateOrderSchema). Provide only changed fields.

capabilities.name: orders_destroy
capabilities.description: Delete an order by ID.

capabilities.name: orders_assign
capabilities.description: Assign a single order to a member (confirmer).

capabilities.name: orders_assign_many
capabilities.description: Assign multiple orders to a member (confirmer).

capabilities.name: orders_send
capabilities.description: Send a guest order (public). Follows SendOrderSchema subset.

capabilities.name: orders_track
capabilities.description: Track an order by ID (public).

capabilities.name: orders_calculate
capabilities.description: Calculate order totals without creating an order (public).
